articles.title: Olaedo Okpareke
articles.description: This blog was created to give some more information about me.
articles.contents: I enjoy swimming, coding, painting, and discussions on film/animation. I also enjoy talking walks.

            Bio
            I am Olaedo Okpareke, a third year student at the university of Toronto. I am enrolled in the Economics and Statistics double major, with a minor in practical french. My main area of interest is finance.
            
            
            Education
            The university of Toronto  | Toronto, Ontario
            Bachelor of Science | September 2019 - May 2023
            
            
            Experience
            ARM Pensions | Investment management Intern | June to July 2021
            KPMG Nigeria | Advisory | August to September 2021
